channel.title: How do I let other people on my server?
channel.description: How do I let other people get on my server? like i got my no-ip address and stuff but what do i do? like also i made a website to download just the client and my friend downloaded it on his comp and when he runs the client its like the server isnt on. but on my comp it is what do i do?

item.title: How do I let other people on my server?
item.dc:creator: @Jadrian Jadrian
item.description:
@Jadrian wrote:

were do i use the passwords?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 23, 2009, 07:06:54 pm[/size][hr]i just did a tutorial on portforwarding and it was the one with utorrent.
what do i do after im done with that?

Read full topic

item.title: How do I let other people on my server?
item.dc:creator: @Epic_Ancient Epic Ancient
item.description:
@Epic_Ancient wrote:

No, but you will need:

Your IP’s Administrative username
Your IP’s Administrative password
Not to fuck anything up or your internet may fail. (Or so I’ve heard.)
If you’re under the age of 15, to ask your parents’ permission (LOL - You probz would have to for the Username/Pass)

Search Port Forwarding on the mopar forums. There’s TONS of guides.

item.title: How do I let other people on my server?
item.dc:creator: @Epic_Ancient Epic Ancient
item.description:
@Epic_Ancient wrote:

  1. Don’t post useless polls.
  2. Port forward.
  3. Don’t ask how to port forward; search how to for yourself. There are plenty of tutorials.
  4. Use the search feature before posting…

Common things
